user.biography: Independent craft brewery in Portland, Maine. Belgian-inspired beers. Certified B Corp. All things beer, food, and Maine. Must be 21+ to follow.

node.text: This week Zach, our Quality Manager, helps to answer two of your questions: can you age saison and wild beers; and what is the best glassware for a lager beer? Have a beer question of your own? Let us know and we may feature it on Quality Time with Allagash.

node.title: Quality Time with Allagash - Aging saison and lager beer glassware

node.text: If you want to know what's going on behind the scenes at Allagash right now, Jill, our Tasting Room's senior manager, sat down with @cheersfrommaine to run through it all.

node.text:
Want to enjoy a perfect glass of Allagash White in the comfort of your own home? Mike is here to show you how to properly "rouse your yeast" for the optimal experience with our favorite witbier.

Have other beer-related questions? Let us know!

node.text: Feel that? Us too. Temperatures in Maine are dropping which means Coolship brewing begins! To help you (and us!) get all geared up for the 2019 Coolship season, check out this incredible video our friend @grassowhat created.

node.text: Truepenny: one both trusty and honest. Also: a crisp and clear pilsner blended with a hint of wild beer. This Belgian-style Pilsner ships to our entire distribution.

node.text: Celebrating National Oyster Day with our friends at Maine Oyster Company.

node.title: Oyster Week at Maine Oyster Company

node.text: We join Mike at Eventide Oyster Company to tell us a little bit about how to get started with briny bivalves.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Allagash Brewing Company in Maine. May be an image of drink and outdoors.

node.text: If it's summer, it must be Two Lights. Brewed with sauvignon blanc grape must and fermented with both lager and Champagne yeast, it's a blended ode to two of our summer loves: beer and wine. Find it hitting shelves in the following states: DE, IL, MA, MD, ME, NH, NC, NJ, NY, PA, SC.

node.text:
Nowaday is our cold-fermented Belgian-style blonde ale. Crisp and dry, with notes of honey, grain, and a light hint of melon. In other words, peak summer enjoyment. 

📸: @mackhennz

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Allagash Brewing Company in Allagash Brewing Company. May be an image of crustacean and indoor.

node.text: Allagash White and lobster. Maine in one meal.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Allagash Brewing Company in Pemaquid Point, Maine. May be an image of nature, twilight and sky.

node.text: Reflecting on the beauty of Maine.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Allagash Brewing Company in Allagash Brewing Company. May be an image of drink.

node.text: You can drink our beer straight from the bottle or can. It'll taste great, but we love drinking it out of our very own chalice, designed to highlight the aroma and appearance of our Belgian-style beers. And to help you enjoy our beer like you’re sitting right here at the brewery, no matter where you are, we’re giving away two free chalices when you spend $50 or more in our online store. You can check out all of our custom designed t-shirts, beach chairs, mugs, hats and more through the link in our profile.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Allagash Brewing Company in Allagash Brewing Company. May be an image of drink, outdoors and text that says 'ALLAGASH ALLAGASH FROM MAINE WITH LOVE T Belgian-Style Belgian Lager'.

node.text:
Love a beautifully clean, bright lager on a summer afternoon? Yea, we do too. So we couldn’t resist taking a crack at a Belgian-style lager with subtle fruit and floral notes adding a bit of complexity to the style’s classically crisp flavor. From Maine, With Love 06 can be found only at the brewery in 4-packs of 16oz cans, with a portion of the proceeds directed toward helping to preserve and protect the waters of Casco Bay.

BONUS: The beautiful image of Maine on this beer’s label could be yours. Just comment with your favorite Maine park, and we’ll randomly select one comment to receive a limited edition 11x14" print of the photo featured on the From Maine, With Love 06 label.

Winners will be notified by July 28, 2021. No Purchase Necessary. Must be 21+ to enter. US residents only. ⁠Not affiliated with Instagram. Ends July 27, 2021. 1 prize. Approx. value: $25.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Allagash Brewing Company in Allagash Brewing Company. May be an image of 1 person and outdoors.

node.text: We didn’t design our Little Grove six-packs to fit perfectly in your bike basket, but it doesn’t hurt that they do. And with an ABV under 4%, we think that these light, bright, fruited ales fit nicely into any summertime situation.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Allagash Brewing Company in Allagash Brewing Company.

node.text: This might come as no surprise, but we dig the outdoors. It's a big part of who we are here at Allagash, both collectively and individually, and that's why we designed our Bring Your Own Adventure Sweepstakes. Here's how it works: For each entry into the sweepstakes, we'll donate $1, up to $5,000, to the @appalachianmountainclub Close To Home trails fund, which works to make the outdoors accessible to as many people as possible. Prizes include an incredible weekend getaway to an AMC lodge and beach-friendly prize packs featuring Yeti coolers. It costs nothing to enter and no purchase is necessary, so help us spread our love for local trails by heading to the link in our bio!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Allagash Brewing Company in Allagash Brewing Company. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text:
This beer was grown right here at Allagash. In Coolship Cerise Estate, Montmorency and North Star cherries—picked by our brewers from our very own orchard out behind the brewery—give this spontaneously fermented beer its notes of ripe cherry and spice. You’ll also find the signature balance and complexity our Coolship beer is known for, including flavors reminiscent of apricot, tart lemon, oak, and a hint of funk—all rounded out by the beer’s refreshingly dry finish.

Coolship Cerise Estate is a limited batch of beer, and it comes out only in the tasting room this Thursday, 7/15.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Allagash Brewing Company in Allagash Brewing Company. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text:
It’s no secret that we love our guests. So we came up with The Allagash Collective. It’s a community of fellow beer lovers looking for the freshest, most innovative beers that we brew—all at a nice discount. Members are treated to perks like the following:

🍾  Access to rare beers on a rotating, monthly basis, like Terration Pomar and Terration Vinha (pictured), both small-batch wild ales aged in clay pots, and available as a discounted bundle only for Collective members
🍺  30% off all draft pours in our tasting room
👍  15% off any merch or beer-to-go in our tasting room
👕  Sweet Collective merch as a gift for joining
😀  And more to come!

If you live nearby and are looking to sign up, you can head straight to the link in our profile.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Allagash Brewing Company in Allagash Brewing Company. May be an image of drink and text that says 'FROM HAINE GASH VHITE BELGIAN-STYLE WHEAT BEER Beer Bw with Coriander Curaçao Orange Peel'.

node.text: There’s just something special about that last can from the 12-pack.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Allagash Brewing Company in Allagash Brewing Company. May be an image of food.

node.text:
You have beer recyclables. We have a place to put ‘em. Next time you swing by our brewery, bring us the items listed below. After your sixth trip, you’ll receive 20% off your entire order on that visit. You win, we win, and the planet wins! On a related note, Maine implemented a statewide ban on single-use plastic shopping bags on 7/1, and we’d like to help you find a place to recycle them if you’re unable to reuse them. So we’ve added these single-use bags to our program. Our complete list of accepted recyclables now includes the following items: 

- Corks (natural, non-synthetic)
- Bottle caps and cages
- PakTech plastic 4-pack holders
- Brown wrapping paper/bubble wrap/plastic air pillows
- Single-use plastic shopping bags

Thanks so much for helping us make our community more sustainable! Learn more about this program, as well as our other sustainability efforts, at the link in our bio.
